statements.sql: select count(*) as aggregate from `users` inner join `favourites` on `users`.`id` = `favourites`.`user_id` where `favourites`.`question_id` = 60 and `user_id` = 1

select `users`.*, `favourites`.`question_id` as `pivot_question_id`, `favourites`.`user_id` as `pivot_user_id`, `favourites`.`created_at` as `pivot_created_at`, `favourites`.`updated_at` as `pivot_updated_at` from `users` inner join `favourites` on `users`.`id` = `favourites`.`user_id` where `favourites`.`question_id` = 60
select * from `answers` where `answers`.`question_id` = 60 and `answers`.`question_id` is not null order by `votes_count` desc
select count(*) as aggregate from `users` inner join `favourites` on `users`.`id` = `favourites`.`user_id` where `favourites`.`question_id` = 60 and `user_id` = 1
